subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Vin Scully, who became a baseball fan as a 9-year-old during the 1936 World Series, will be in the booth at Dodger Stadium on Friday when the Yankees visit for the first time in six years.
snippet: Vin Scully, who became a baseball fan as a 9-year-old during the 1936 World Series, will be in the booth at Dodger Stadium on Friday when the Yankees visit for the first time in six years.
